items.preText: I did say West Indies could win if someone hung around with Hope. But not if they can't turn over the strike, though you can't blame Paul, who's not a proper batsman. His dot balls though, have swung this towards Bangladesh slightly
items.text: bowls it into his pads, and he stays back to turn this to fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up more, he was backing away and the ball kept going with the arm. Gets bat on it, chops it on the ground to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, no run

items.text: backing away again, but Shakib doesn't follow him fully, allowing him to push ti to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Paul, 1 run

items.text: pushed to cover, and an early call of 'NO'
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, he comes forward to try and turn it away, but can't get past midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: stays back in his crease and punches this to deep cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: surya: "Happy that Windies have got atleast two batsmen who have cracked the ODI format and are young too.Hetmyer though has to guard against being complacent. It is so important in a team where veterans still seem to have only two extreme modes of batting which succeeds once in a bluemoon."
items.text: goes across him, too wide of off, and he hits it powerfully through cover, but there is a man back and only one run results
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full ball, dug out via  checked drive that went in the air over cover. Fortunately for him, not where a fielder was
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 1 run

items.text: almighty swipe across the line but he doesn't connect. Only goes to mid-off and they get through for a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length angling across, pushed to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: slower ball, yorker. Sneaks under his bat, but it's angled across, so misses off stump too.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.text: swish and miss again. Angled across once again and once again he connects only with air when trying to cut it away. Too close to cut, but he also hasn't read Mustafizur's changes of pace and off-cutters at all
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, no run

items.preText: Unless this is a big over, this might slip well away from West Indies. 32 from 18 now. Rubel has the ball. Square leg, midwicket and long-on on the fence on the legside
items.text: bang what a start to the over. full length, he cleared his front leg and whacked it straight back over the bowler, and over the rope too
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, SIX runs

items.preText: 26 off 17 now and Shai Hope has his highest ever ODI score too with that six
items.text: overthrows keep Hope on strike driven firmly to point and they are completing a comfortable single but the fielder has a shy, It's too wild and allows a second
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: digs in a bouncer. Hope ducks underneath and looks at the umpire, but he signals that it's legit and it's one bouncer for the over
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: yorker goes wrong and ends up as a full toss. The big drive also goes a bit wrong, in that he doesn't get the placement right. straight to deep cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good short ball from Rubel, and Paul has a wild heave that connects with nothing
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, no run

items.text: dropped at deep square leg Another short ball, Paul nailed the pull that time and hit it hard, and flat. Nazmul was there but the ball was travelling. He over-ran it in fact, and then stuck out a hand to just about stop it, but never looked like catching it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, 1 run

items.text: moves across his stumps and manages to get enough bat on it to flick it to midwicket and get off strike
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Paul, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, sliced to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: goes too wide across and that will be a wide. Extra run and extra ball
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 wide

items.text: goes very wide across again and Hope connects well. Backs away and slaps it past point. Third man was running towards it but the ball beats him
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.preText: 14 off 9. The Fizz is bowling everything across the batsman and Hope anticipated that. Will he change things up now?
items.text: gets it away again, this is fantastic batting Fizz went short outside off that time, he transferred weight back and slapped it to wide long-off for another four. Great placement
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: misses the attempted glide that time, with Fizz keeping it full and in the yorker zone. Goes across Hope and to the keeper
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: over the keeper and a boundary 16 runs off the over. what a shot that was. He went down on one knee to paddle it, ended up not timing it well and hitting it right back over the keeper from one knee. No fielder there and it's another boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs
